data.text: Upon passenger’s request, @airBaltic will extend the validity of gift vouchers issued as a refund for Covid-19 cancelled flights. They can be extended for travels till December 31, 2022. Please contact our Call Center for further assistance: https://t.co/kTjjrNEtoF https://t.co/vWm0AeWhmP

data.text: @mooneshe @eriksmiks Vislabāko un sev piemērotāko sēdvietu varat sameklēt, skatoties tieši uz Airbus A220-300 lidmašīnu 😊 https://t.co/pKN6czOWjX

@mooneshe Labdien, Madara! Varam ieteikt izmantot mūsu sēdvietas rezervēšanas pakalpojumu: https://t.co/tejmwFEcX6
Ja minētais pakalpojums iepriekš nav rezervēts, sēdvietas reģistrācijas laikā tiek piešķirtas automātiski. Paldies!

@rahimjondq @bekorchi1994 Hello! Ticket date/time change or cancelation rules depends on your purchased ticket type. For more details please visit our web page: https://t.co/A6j9rxtgYU
Thank you.

@IeKaVa Labdien, Ieva! Paldies par Jūsu jautājumu. Varam apliecināt, ka drošība ir airBaltic prioritāte. Lidojumu maršruti tiek rūpīgi plānoti, kā arī nepieciešamības gadījumā mainīti, ievērojot visas starptautiskās drošības normas un rekomendācijas. Paldies.

New Baltic Outlook available on board! This issue will take you to the Italian town of Pisa - an adventure for your senses with many architectural masterpieces and incredible food. Read the article, and see what else the new issue has for you 👉 https://t.co/Lcyem3ZPMR https://t.co/n7xnZrNkns

data.text: Thanks for being a part of our weekly quiz! Next time you're travelling with us, be sure to use your mobile device to connect to https://t.co/llumPFUESD to get the best experience with our on board services. We can’t wait for you to try it! 💚
@XavC67 Hello! Thanks for your question. We have provided you with an answer on Instagram. However - yes! We do offer flights on your mentioned route! 😊

@kasparsskincs Labdien, Kaspar! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Lūgums privātā ziņā mums atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par aizkavējušos bagāžu (bagāžas birkas numuru, aizkavētās bagāžas faila numuru). Mēs pārbaudīsim! Paldies.

urls.title: Aizkavējusies, nozaudēta vai bojāta bagāža | Bagāžas noteikumi | airBaltic
urls.description: Tava bagāža ir aizkavējusies, nozaudēta vai bojāta? Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām. Lūdzam savlaicīgi ziņot par to airBaltic un aizpildīt iesniegumu!

data.text:
@kasparsskincs Labdien, Kaspar! Izsakām nožēlu par neērtībām, ar kurām Jums ir nācies saskarties aizkavētās bagāžas dēļ. Šajā situācijā aicinām apmeklēt mūsu mājas lapu, kur iespējams iepazīties ar informāciju par tālāko rīcību Jūsu situācijā: https://t.co/xFcI5d8LaF
Paldies!
@KatrinaSlisane @IneseEjugbo Tieši tā! Tomēr  - kā minējām iepriekš, aicinām šo informāciju pārbaudīt ar atbildīgajām oficiālajām valsts institūcijām īsi pirms plānotā lidojuma. Paldies!

data.text: As of August 11, @airBaltic will perform additional late night, early morning flights between Kyiv and Riga. Overall, we'll now perform up to two daily flights on this route, thus improving the service provided to passengers travelling between the two cities and beyond. https://t.co/WPabJVplzg

@KatrinaSlisane @IneseEjugbo Labdien! Informējam, ka, uzrādot derīgu ES sertifikātu, testu ne pirms, ne ielidojot Latvijā nav nepieciešams veikt. Tomēr aicinām informāciju pārbaudīt, sazinoties ar atbildīgajām valsts iestādēm neilgi pirms plānotā lidojuma. Sīkāk: https://t.co/pmbesQF1FR

data.text:
It’s Friday then…. #airBalticQuiz time 😎 airBaltic SKY service is live - it enables passengers to use their 📱 to order meals or check the Sky Shop, read the Baltic Outlook magazine and airBaltic Blog.
What is the network name our passengers will be searching for after 🛫 ?

@planetEML Good morning! We are glad to hear you are flying with us! The schedulling is usually done few days before the flight. Due to operational reasons there still can be changes shortly before the flight.
Fingers crossed you fly on YL-CSL!

urls.title: airBaltic Bitcoin payments extended by various crypto currencies

data.text:

https://t.co/TZO3n3NwKV

data.text: #DidYouKnow that airBaltic was the first airline in the world to accept Bitcoin for flight bookings? The cryptocurrency payment option was introduced in 2014 and is still available for GREEN and GREEN plus tickets! https://t.co/qUjfEM27EA
@ugisu Paldies! Arī Jums!

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text: @myAna8K Sīkāku jautājumu saistībā tieši ar Jūsu rezervāciju, un ja sēdvietas vēlaties mainīt, aicinām sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu: https://t.co/CHGjV15S1F

@myAna8K Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Mums būs grūti publiski komentēt bez sensitīvām lidojumu detaļām, taču vēlamies informēt, ka sistēma pasažierus vienas rezervācijas ietvaros cenšās sēdināt kopā cik vien tas iespējams. Jūsu norādītās sēdvietas ir arī uzreiz viena aiz otras.

data.text: In accordance with the bond calendar outlined in the final prospectus of the bond issue, @airBaltic on July 27 has made already its second bond coupon payment to its investors in the amount of EUR 13.5 million. Read more: https://t.co/yniTBPNpMl https://t.co/M5dAUmODTb

@ugisu Labrīt! Varam informēt, ka visas e-pastā ievietotās saites ir korektas. Uzspiežot uz vienu no pogām, lietotājs tiks novirzīts uz aptaujas platformu, pēc kuras mums ir skaidrs - tiek pieņemti noteikumi, vai pieprasīta konta slēgšana.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic

data.text:
Thank you for participating! As you may know, we like to be innovative and take the lead. But what will surprise you is that only 39% got it right this time 👀 
Back in 2007 airBaltic was proud to launch its online check-in system! Time flies (even though it’s not an A220)! ✈️
@jmichelp Good evening! Information we have received is that flight is currently delayed due to thunderstorm activities - we plan to depart in the next 40 minutes. We thank for your understanding.

@Ditsyloy May we ask you to share more details in regards to this (such as file reference number as well as delayed baggage tag numbers) privately via direct message? We will check your particular situation. Thank you.

@Ditsyloy In this case we can invite you to contact the Lost and Found office, where the delayed baggage report was created, or - check the status of your baggage and manage the report with our online tool: https://t.co/yav3U4jUKc
Thank you.

Time for #airBalticQuiz! As we are moving forward and adding new features to our website such as co-browsing, let’s take a walk down the memory lane…. 
When was one of the first major online features - airBaltic online check-in introduced? 🖥

urls.title: Delayed, lost or damaged baggage | Baggage Rules | airBaltic
urls.description: To ensure the soonest possible tracing and delivery, delayed baggage should be reported immediately after the flight.

data.text: @DelarbreD @FlyingBrussels Hello! We are saddened to hear about such unpleasant situation, our apologies. If your last flight in the itinerary was performed by us, please check this link for all your next actions: https://t.co/pDmf3gcMZN

data.text: We are happy to improve our passenger travel experience, introducing an online self-service platform for delayed baggage service. Thanks to the new feature, passengers now can create or manage reports and track their delayed baggage online: https://t.co/VNxKtXc0cz https://t.co/AJCG6FxSLM

@Aldis371 Testa režīmā piedāvājam tagad iespēju pasūtīt maltīti uzreiz pēc pacelšanās izmantojot viedtālruni - sīkāku informāciju saņemsiet jau lidmašīnā. Tāpēc ļoti ceram, ka bez svētku maltītes nepaliksiet!

@Aldis371 Ja lidojums ir jau šodien, tad maltīti tiešsaistē diemžēl pasūtīt vairs nav iespējams. Šādā gadījumā aicinām Jūs iegādāties maltīti lidojuma laikā no ēdienkartes, ko atradīsiet priekšā esošā sēdekļa kabatā.
@Aldis371 Lūdzam DM ziņā privāti atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas, kā arī ekrānšāviņu ar kļūdas paziņojumu, ko novērojat izmantojot tiešsaistes formu! Paldies!

urls.title: Veikt maksājumu | Papildpakalpojumi | airBaltic
urls.description: Izmanto šo formu, lai pieteiktu lidojumu datuma maiņu, pasažieru vārdu maiņu, pievienotu bagāžu, sporta ekipējumu vai maltīti uz klāja, pieteiktu pavadoņa pakalpojumu vai rezervētu biļeti mājdzīvniekam.

data.text: @Aldis371 Labdien! Atvainojamies par tehniskām kļūdām. Lūdzam šajā gadījumā pieprasīt maltīti izmantojot mūsu tiešsaistes formu: https://t.co/7sGi8cThRt
@FDeverell All passengers who had this service already pre-booked before have been contacted, informed about this change from Dublin Airport and issued a refund for the said service.
@FDeverell We kindly ask you to check our webpage - it has been updated stating exactly the same! :) https://t.co/K4DeesZb9a

data.text: Join us today on a webinar about the challenges of reconnecting Europe in a post-pandemic world! airBaltic CEO @Gaussm will take part in a debate of government policies, consumer habit changes and aviation reshape in the medium and longer-term. https://t.co/nh27uNfDck

@tomasslakotko1 Labdien! Aicinām ieskatīties arī Jūsu e-pasta spama kastītē. Ja iekāpšanas karšu joprojām tur nav, tās variet iegūt vēlreiz - ievadot rezervācijas numuru, kā arī savu uzvārdu mūsu mājaslapas sadaļā "Reģistrēties reisam".
@Sam_Beaux Good morning! Let us continue our conversation on Facebook, thank you!

data.text: @Ditsyloy Good morning, Kenneth. So saddened to hear about such situation with the baggage, our apologies. As we understand from your tweets you are already in contact with airport personnel, however we kindly ask you to read this link for all your next actions: https://t.co/pDmf3gcMZN
@tomasslakotko1 Viss kārtībā! Lai jauks trešdienas vakars!

@tomasslakotko1 Kā jau minējām - šis pakalpojums ir iekļauts visās biļešu klasēs automātiski. Papildus to nav nepieciešams pievienot. :) Taču, ja vēlaties, variet atsūtīt savu rezervācijas numuru privāti!

urls.title: Mainīt lidojumu - Izmaiņas ceļojumā | airBaltic

data.text: @tomasslakotko1 Labdien! Visās airBaltic biļešu klasēs nu ir iekļauta datuma/laika maiņas iespēja! Sīkākas detaļas par visiem nosacījumiem: https://t.co/basVOQPrAJ

data.text: #DidYouKnow that more than 50 000 hours of training were performed on our now-retired Boeing 737 full flight simulator since 2010, reaching a peak in 2018, when it was in use for more than 85% of commercially available time during the entire year? https://t.co/TxNKxWIL3r

data.text: A significant era has come to an end - airBaltic Training has said goodbye to the Boeing 737 full flight simulator. Farewell - thank you for your service since 2010! https://t.co/qpzQKfYv0k
@KayleighL000 Hello! If you mean https://t.co/YnWHCo62ib, then we can invite you to submit it once again tomorrow (if it's showing that it won't be valid for tomorrow's flight).

Thank you for participating!
Most of you got it right as one of the most challenging clouds is Cumulonimbus ☁️ 
It’s heavy and dense cloud with rain, hail and lightning inside. It is recommended to avoid them as much as possible. https://t.co/JAmSYXJP5b

@katrinapriede Labrīt! airBaltic veic visu nepieciešamo dokumentu pārbaudi atbilstoši šī brīža MK noteikumiem. Tāpat ceļošanai nepieciešamos dokumentus nepieciešamības gadījumā pārbaudām gan pie reģistrācijas galdiņa, gan arī attālinātā veidā: https://t.co/sgA0C7gbv6

@helvettia Sure! Here’s the web page of Ministry of Transport of Latvia.

https://t.co/5RADWMkQ47

@helvettia Hi! Until 1 September, 2021, any kind of official document issued within EU/EEA/Switzerland/UK which confirms the completion of vaccination or recovery from the disease will be accepted in parallel with EU digital certificate. For more details, visit: https://t.co/3bGziMdKjA

@helvettia @serene_euphoria @Sat_Min Labdien! Līdz šī gada 1.septembrim paralēli Eiropas digitālajam sertifikātam tiks akceptēts arī jebkurš cits oficiāls dokuments, kas izdots ES/EEZ/Šveicē/AK un apliecina pabeigtu vakcināciju vai pārslimošanas faktu. Vairāk: https://t.co/1UiREyNnUt

@moilojo @riga_airport Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please accept our apologies for this situation. We are aware of this delay, and have informed our colleagues at the airport about it. Please know that passengers should receive their luggage soon.

@AndrewCRBarnett Hello Andrew! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please accept our apologies for this situation. We are aware of this delay, and have informed our colleagues at the airport about it. Please know that passengers should receive their luggage soon.

@RPilsetnieks @Lidosta_Riga Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Atvainojamies par šo situāciju. Patiesi ir notikusi aizkavēšanās ar šī reisa bagāžas saņemšanu, taču esam informējuši kolēģus un pasažieri jau drīzumā saņems savu bagāžu.

@zanetalkssports Lūdzam skatīt iepriekšējo tvītu! :)
Sīkākas detaļas atrodamas arī mūsu mājaslapā: https://t.co/1UiREyNnUt

data.text: @zanetalkssports Labdien. Šādas baumas nevarēsim komentēt. Varam informēt par faktiem - ja pasažiera rīcībā ir ES/EEZ/Šveicē/Lielbritānijā izdots digitālais Covid-19 vakcinācijas sertifikāts, kā arī aizritējušas vismaz 15 dienas kopš pēdējās devas saņemšanas, tests lidojot uz LV nav nepieciešams.

@KayRayxxx Labdien! Jā, tests būs derīgs. Lūdzam ņemt vērā, ka Antigen testam jābūt veiktam laboratoriski un tas nevar būt vecāks par 48h pirms izlidošanas laika reisam uz Latviju!
Sīkākas detaļas: https://t.co/1UiREyNnUt

data.text:
Another Friday, another #airBalticQuiz! This week we’re focusing on an important aspect of aviation - meteorology 🌤 
Which of the following type of clouds requires pilots to avoid flying through them? ☁️

urls.title: Checked baggage | Baggage rules | airBaltic
urls.description: Each piece of free checked baggage and each piece of additionally-purchased baggage entitles the passenger to a 23 kg allowance per piece.

data.text: @boredksenia Please note there's a different procedure if paying at the airport - if any piece of checked baggage exceeds the 23 kg per bag allowance, passengers will be charged a 50 EUR heavy baggage fee. More details: https://t.co/89lILKH2sQ

@boredksenia If the total weight of both bags combined are within 46 kg, you will be fine with 2 bags booked. Please note that maximum weight of one baggage in such case cannot surpass 32 kg due to EU safety rules. Thank you!

@boredksenia Good morning! We can invite you to pre-book another (2nd) checked baggage item online in this case. This will allow you to transport 2 bags and shuffle weight between them (let's say 30 + 16 kg), or transport 1 bag weighing for example 30 kg. :)

@Daartuc Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Atvainojamies par šo situāciju - atsevišķās stundās mūsu Zvanu centrs ir ļoti noslogots, taču ar nelielu gaidīšanas laiku lielākajai daļai pasažieru izdodas kolēģus sazvanīt.

@stephen32b Hello Stephen! Thank you for reaching out to us. Our apologies for the cancelled flight. Have you already requested a refund for your reservation? Please know we have received an increased amount of mails lately, therefore unfortunately it takes longer for our agents to reply.
@RobertsTautvids Labdien, Robert. Vai varam lūgt privāti atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas DM ziņā par rezervāciju? Paldies!

data.text: @doglog69 Please be reminded that in these times restrictions are changing very fast, therefore we advise our passengers to double check the entry restrictions with local authorities shortly before their travel for the most precise details.

@doglog69 Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please know the entry restrictions are set by the government of Finland, and not airBaltic. Whether or not you’re required a PCR test depends on your departure country. Please check the official sources: https://t.co/FSKmE4q85U

#DidYouKnow that our company has a devoted Quality Department, which is responsible for monitoring the regulated aviation activities and performing activity-specific audits across our organization, fleet and network? https://t.co/gs2WIpApOg
@setline84 Labvakar! Paldies par ziņu. Vai varam lūgt sazināties ar mums privāti, atsūtot ziņā minēto kodu? Apskatīsim!

data.text:
Busy days at airport are our favourite! ✈️
This year’s travel season is at its peak - we’re excited to conquer the sky and race the clouds together with you! Watch a recent time-lapse of our fleet getting ready for flights at @riga_airport! https://t.co/U7opkHzlCv

@puucha Labdien! Turpinām darbu pie mājaslapas uzlabošanas, tāpēc informācija par vecām rezervācijām šobrīd personīgā profila sadaļā varētu nebūt pieejama.
Ja Jūsu rīcībā ir rezervācijas numurs, lūdzam to atsūtīt DM ziņā - pārbaudīsim, kāds ir atmaksas statuss.

data.text:
@Glider @kleevahew Information about travelling to Latvia is also available on our webpage: https://t.co/3bGziMdKjA
We are updating it as soon as there are new details emerging, or changes in the Law. Thank you!

data.text: @Glider @kleevahew Information from the above mentioned website concerns people, who would like to visit a concert, for example. There is a different requirement for status "Vaccinated" when travelling. We understand your confusion, however these websites are operated by government institutions.

Congratulations to airBaltic Training for welcoming already its 9th @DiamondAircraft training aircraft for airBaltic Pilot Academy! We are proud of your on-going commitment to invest in the best training aircraft in the industry. https://t.co/rnRO8ok1qS https://t.co/WyaEanVXHQ
@pulks Piekrītam! 💚✈️

@emiliehagedoorn Good morning! airBaltic is following all the entry requirements from the respective country. As they tend to change very often, for the latest details we kindly ask you to check this link:
https://t.co/t2BjITi7ZI or by contacting local authorities! Thank you!

@Glider @kleevahew Hello, Alexander. airBaltic is following Latvian entry requirements which state that only full vaccination course (+15 days since receiving the last dose) is enough in such case. More details from the Ministry of Transport: https://t.co/5RADWMkQ47 https://t.co/AGPJBsW9lR
@GrazulisRomas Wonderful! ☀️ Thanks for sharing!
We are very lucky to experience some amazing sunsets this summer! 🧡 https://t.co/kQspaVlz6B

@Lika32427950 Labdien! Ja neesiet vakcinēta, pirms lidojuma uz Latviju Jums būs nepieciešams negatīvs Covid-19 testa rezultāts:
* PCR testa rezultāts, kas veikts 72h pirms lidojuma
VAI
* Antigen testa rezultāts, kas veikts 48h pirms lidojuma.
Sīkāk: https://t.co/1UiREyNnUt

Quiz time is up and the majority of you have answered correctly!

Liepāja is known as the city of wind! Indeed - it is the windiest city in Latvia and the region holds the largest wind farm in the country! 🌬
@jekaterok @berlinairport Hello and our apologies for such situation and waiting. We have already contacted our representatives at the airport in regards to this to clarify the situation.

@meekaale Good morning! Sorry to hear that! We kindly ask you to try from a different internet browser or device. If the problem still persists please contact us privately with more details as well as screenshots! Thank you!

data.text: @Rahul21Rd Hello! Please be informed that entry requirements are set by the respective country to which passenger is travelling. If all documents are in order there shouldn’t be any issues for you to board the flight! 🙂
@RustamJafarov1 Hello! No, as this is a cabin baggage which passenger takes on board. If you would like to check-in the bag, you will need to add checked baggage allowance to your reservation.

data.text: Jumping into Friday with another #airBalticQuiz! We have just issued our fourth #NFT this week on OpenSea. This new #cryptoart represents one of the most beloved Latvian cities on the Baltic Sea coast - Liepāja 🌊 Which of these is also another name that this city goes by?
In June 2021, airBaltic has carried 114 700 passengers or 70% more than the previous month. Read more about June passenger statistics here: https://t.co/367Bm9UqQ5 https://t.co/vzr6JaGmoD
@mglonxp Correct! However please note that you need to have a vaccination certificate issued either in EU/EEA/UK or CH country.
@KPitkevica Kā jau rakstījām - ja konkrētās situācijas dēļ būs izmaiņas mūsu lidojumu grafikā - informēsim visus ietekmētos pasažierus par to, gan pieejamām alternatīvām, ja tādas būs nepieciešamas!
@KPitkevica airBaltic lidojumus Sicīlijas salā veic uz Katānijas, ne Palermo lidostu. ☺️

@KPitkevica Labdien! Aktīvi sekojam līdzi informācijai konkrētajā reģionā. Informēsim visus ietekmētos pasažierus, ja būs kādas izmaiņas mūsu lidojumu grafikā. Taču tuvākajās dienās lidojumi uz/no Katānijas mums nav plānoti.

@TheKuklands Tieši tā!

Lai saulaina pēcpusdiena!
@TheKuklands Paldies! Ja neesiet pilnībā vakcinēts pret Covid-19, ceļojot uz Latviju ir derīgs arī negatīvs Antigen testa rezultāts, kas veikts laboratoriski 24h laikā pirms lidojuma.

data.text:
@TheKuklands Labdien! Tas atkarīgs no valsts, uz kuru plānojiet ceļot, jo ieceļošanas noteikumus un prasības nosaka tieši tās, nevis aviokompānija!
Sīkākas detaļas: https://t.co/qHFIBt3sEn

@Michaelianking1 Hi, Michael! Sorry to hear you won't be able to fly with your family.
No, in such case you don't need to be at the airport's check-in of course or register for the flight.
